item.title: Jareds miner *no anti randoms sorry*
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

… Lol.

[code]program wcer;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}

//Made By Jared, Edited by Akuma

const
ore1 = 5278174; //rock color
ore2 = 6001639; //rock color
ore3 = 5541863; //rock color
ore = 3558494;
waittime = 2300; //works well for me with 44 mineing and rune pick and its relatively fast.

procedure cutemdown;
begin
WAIT(waittime+RANDOM(846))
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore1,1,1,515,336))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore2,1,1,515,336))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore3,1,1,515,336))then
if istextat2(9,9,‘Cut’,20) then
mouse(x+random(2),y+random(2),3+random(2),3+random(2), true);
repeat
wait(200);
until(not(findcolorspiral(x,y,255,708,143,643,123)));
end;

procedure dropemdown;
begin
if(invincount=28)then
dropcolor(ore);
end;

procedure runon;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,11119017,698,469,725,498))then
mouse(x,y,3,3,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
mouse(637-random(35),280-random(20),3,3, true);
wait(700+random(300))
mouse(657-random(30),198-random(20),3,3,true);
end;

begin
runon;
repeat
dropemdown;
cutemdown;
dropemdown;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Jareds miner *no anti randoms sorry*
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Ok, wait a second

[code]program wcer;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}

//Made By Jared, Edited by Akuma

const
ore1 = 5278174; //rock color
ore2 = 6001639; //rock color
ore3 = 5541863; //rock color
ore = 3558494;
waittime = 2300; //works well for me with 44 mineing and rune pick and its relatively fast.

procedure cutemdown;
begin
WAIT(waittime+RANDOM(846))
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore1,1,1,515,336))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore2,1,1,515,336))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore3,1,1,515,336))then
mouse(x+random(2),y+random(2),3+random(2),3+random(2), true);
repeat
wait(200);
until(not(findcolorspiral(x,y,255,708,143,643,123)));
end;

procedure dropemdown;
begin
if(invincount=28)then
dropcolor(ore);
end;

procedure runon;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,11119017,698,469,725,498))then
mouse(x,y,3,3,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
mouse(637-random(35),280-random(20),3,3, true);
wait(700+random(300))
mouse(657-random(30),198-random(20),3,3,true);
end;

begin
runon;
repeat
dropemdown;
cutemdown;
dropemdown;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: Jareds miner *no anti randoms sorry*
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Jared, you should change the coords in your findcolorspiral to 515,336.

Like this findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)

This is only the main screen of rs not the Inventory Or Minimap.
Which eliminates the problem posted above.

Read full topic

item.title: Jareds miner *no anti randoms sorry*
item.dc:creator: @Jared Jared
item.description:
@Jared wrote:

ok well the procedures all work well,
when it clicks a rock it waits for the flag to go away for the time alowed to mine the rock

i will make the mining procedure a bit better soon as i can finish it, make it more random than it is now.

[code]program wcer;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}

const
ore1 = 5278174; //rock color
ore2 = 6001639; //rock color
ore3 = 5541863; //rock color
ore = 3558494;
waittime = 2300; //works well for me with 44 mineing and rune pick and its relatively fast.

procedure cutemdown;
begin
WAIT(waittime+RANDOM(846))
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore1,1,1,666,408))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore2,1,1,666,408))or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,ore3,1,1,666,408))then
mouse(x+random(2),y+random(2),3+random(2),3+random(2), true);
repeat
wait(200);
until(not(findcolorspiral(x,y,255,708,143,643,123)));
end;

procedure dropemdown;
begin
if(invincount=28)then
dropcolor(ore);
end;

procedure runon;
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,11119017,698,469,725,498))then
mouse(x,y,3,3,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
mouse(637-random(35),280-random(20),3,3, true);
wait(700+random(300))
mouse(657-random(30),198-random(20),3,3,true);
end;

begin
runon;
repeat
dropemdown;
cutemdown;
dropemdown;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
